about_the_game:
Poolside 18+ is a simple erotic fiction


Poolside 18+ is focused on having higher quality and detail during "playtime" for the player to enjoy.

This allows you to enjoy all the game has to offer in a compact and linear format to get straight into the action.

After arriving at a weekend home for a break, you and girlfriend enjoy your time with one another.

This enjoyment expands throughout the house from the outside and to the bedroom.

Let the time fly as you enjoy one another by the poolside.

Just relax and enjoy the highest quality animations we can create for you.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes sexual animation with the cover girl in various positions around a pool.

name: Poolside 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7, Windows8, Windows8.1, Windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Able to run 1920x1080
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
